channel.title: Making a server
channel.description:
ok i have looked at god of ikiliki tut for making a server and i have done everything... iv actually been on my source and edited stats and made myself owner... one thing though.. it only lets me log on at ip 127.0.0.1 and no-one can join that ip :( iv tried my ip address.. and says error connecting to server... same when i make a no-ip and still says error connecting to server!!!
what could the problem be!?!?!?!?
my friend said my ip is able to make a server???? is that true???

item.title: Making a server
item.dc:creator: @mod_skill mod skill
item.description:
@mod_skill wrote:

ok what am i supposed to name the aplication on port forwarding page??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2008, 06:24:50 PM[/size][hr]what am i supposed to name the port forwarding application?? please tell me!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Making a server
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

No problem.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2008, 06:15:54 PM[/size][hr][quote=“m i k e y o u n g, post:7, topic:186399”][quote author=ownageownt link=topic=248859.msg2088806#msg2088806 date=1204693883]
Lol, if you dont port forward then other people cant play on your server.
[/quote]other play my sever the most ever was like 66[/quote]

But you probably port forwarded or you didnt have to.

Read full topic
